member.name: T:Microsoft.WebAnalytics.Behaviors.Pulse
member.summary: A Pulse event that sends a "Timer" analytics event at a prescribed interval
member.remarks:
These are the properties in the AnalyticsEvent that are set by the Pulse behavior at each interval
AnalyticsEvent Property Description
NameTimer
ObjectName AssociatedObject.Name
TimeCode timespan since the associated object was loaded
Value number of seconds since the associated object was loaded

member.name: T:Microsoft.WebAnalytics.Behaviors.ABTesting
member.summary: A/B Testing behavior
member.remarks:
Add this behavior to use the Visual State Manager to enable A/B Testing. You can use the Application Init. Parameters to force the selection of a variant.
Setting the Variant to "A"
<object ...> <param name="initparams" value="SAFVariant=A"/> </object>
Setting the Variant to control group (removing the persistent variant - "control" is a special value here).
<object ...> <param name="initparams" value="SAFVariant=control"/> </object>

member.name: M:Microsoft.WebAnalytics.Behaviors.ABTesting.OnAttached
member.summary: Attach the A/B testing handler

member.summary: Find the root of the scene
member.returns: the root control that has no parent

member.summary: Update the state

member.summary: Update the state for A/B testing

member.summary: Select a state name
